title: How to Delete Collections on TikTok

steps.title: Tap the profile icon in the TikTok app.
steps.content: Tap the profile icon in the TikTok app. It's the icon that resembles a person in the lower-right corner.

steps.title: Tap the bookmark icon.
steps.content: Tap the bookmark icon. It's the fourth icon next to the heart below your profile information. This displays your favorites .

steps.title: Tap Collections.
steps.content: Tap Collections . It's the second tab below the icons. This displays all your collections.

steps.title: Tap the collection you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the collection you want to delete. You will see the videos in that collection.

steps.title: Tap the Share icon .
steps.content: Tap the Share icon . It's the curved arrow pointing right. This opens the Share menu. You can also use the Share menu to rename the collection or make it public/private.

steps.title: Tap Delete Collection.
steps.content: Tap Delete Collection . It's at the bottom of the screen in the Share menu.

steps.title: Tap Delete to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Delete to confirm. This deletes the collection from TikTok . All the videos in that collection will remain in your Favorites. To remove a video from your favorites , return to your profile, tap the bookmark icon, select a video, and then tap the bookmark on the right.
